deeksha.name: Deeksha
deeksha.voice_message: Hey there! Great to see you, buddy! How have you been?

voice_message_translations.hi: अरे यार! तुम्हें देखकर बहुत खुशी हुई! कैसे हो?

sakshi.name: Sakshi
sakshi.voice_message: Hi friend! Remember our college days? Hope you're doing well!

voice_message_translations.hi: हाय दोस्त! हमारे कॉलेज के दिन याद हैं? उम्मीद है तुम ठीक हो!
voice_message_translations.en: Hi friend! Remember our college days? Hope you're doing well!
